title: Cannot add a module in truffle project
body:
## Versions

| — | version |
|---|--------|
| OS | arch, ubuntu 20_04, OSX 12.3.1|
| node | v16.14.2 |
| npm | v6.14.16 |
| yarn |  1.22.18 |
| lerna |  v4.0.0 |

## Reproduction steps:

1. run bootstrap on project
2. try to add any module in any package (I used log4js and config respectively)

```console
$ yarn add log4js -D
```
<details><summary>Error output</summary>

```console

yarn add v1.22.18
[1/4] 🔍  Resolving packages...
[2/4] 🚚  Fetching packages...
[3/4] 🔗  Linking dependencies...
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/codec > ttypescript@1.5.8" has unmet peer dependency "ts-node@^8.0.2".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/codec > ttypescript@1.5.8" has incorrect peer dependency "typescript@^3.2.2".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/compile-solidity > ttypescript@1.5.12" has unmet peer dependency "ts-node@>=8.0.2".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/dashboard > @testing-library/user-event@13.5.0" has unmet peer dependency "@testing-library/dom@>=7.21.4".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/db > @gql2ts/from-schema@2.0.0-4" has incorrect peer dependency "graphql@>= 0.10 <15".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/debugger > mochapack@2.1.2" has incorrect peer dependency "mocha@>=6 <9".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin > tsutils@3.21.0" has unmet peer dependency "typescript@>=2.8.0 || >= 3.2.0-dev || >= 3.3.0-dev || >= 3.4.0-dev || >= 3.5.0-dev || >= 3.6.0-dev || >= 3.6.0-beta || >= 3.7.0-dev || >= 3.7.0-beta".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/db > @gql2ts/from-schema > @gql2ts/util@2.0.0-0" has incorrect peer dependency "graphql@>= 0.10 <15".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/core > @truffle/preserve-to-buckets > ipfs-http-client > native-abort-controller@0.0.3" has unmet peer dependency "abort-controller@*".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/hdwallet-provider > web3-provider-engine > eth-block-tracker > @babel/plugin-transform-runtime@7.10.3" has unmet peer dependency "@babel/core@^7.0.0-0".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/core > @truffle/preserve-to-buckets > @textile/hub > @textile/buckets > @improbable-eng/grpc-web@0.13.0" has unmet peer dependency "google-protobuf@^3.2.0".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/core > @truffle/preserve-to-buckets > @textile/hub > @textile/hub-filecoin > @improbable-eng/grpc-web@0.12.0" has unmet peer dependency "google-protobuf@^3.2.0".
warning "workspace-aggregator-24532c5e-e122-4e48-9779-d92b35403a8b > @truffle/core > @truffle/preserve-to-buckets > ipfs-http-client > multiaddr > dns-over-http-resolver > native-fetch@3.0.0" has unmet peer dependency "node-fetch@*".
error An unexpected error occurred: "expected workspace package to exist for \"@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin\"".
info If you think this is a bug, please open a bug report with the information provided in "/Users/amal/work/truffle/packages/config/yarn-error.log".
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/add for documentation about this command.
```

</details>

This [Yarn issue](https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/issues/8405) might be relevant
